entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:05 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Rain or snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
